captions.text:
My name is Gabriel Negri, I'm 25 years 
 old and this is my Vectra Turbo.
The funniest story about this Vectra...
...is that when I showed it to my friends, half of them...
...congratulated me, because they know the car's full potential, specially because the (potential of) cylinder head.
But the other half simple stated:

"What the hell are you doing? Do you have sh*t on your 
 head? You are going from newer cars to older ones!"
They simply didn't understand my thinking...
...of lowering the car's qualities in exchange of a higher turbo pressure!

The car has an HX35 Turbo, 2.5" aluminum intake, an 
 imported intercooler, forged rods (K1) and pistons (IASA),
ARP stud bolts and "blockguard",
oil pump is from Vectra 2.4 16v engine (reworked).

And the most important thing, the cylinder overhead is 
 still original, without any upgrade on its components.

The fuel injection system is a little non standard, it is 
 a MegaSquirt with auto adjustments, correction via WideBand AEM...

...and 2 important factors: "2-step", which is common, 
 but this injection is connected to flatshift.
The fuel pump was changed too, now it is a Walbro...
...and the external fuel pump is a Mercedes. The Injection Nozzle (4 of them) are Clinic, most known as FIC. They are 1050cc with low impedance.

Another curious thing about this car is that its engine 
 drivetrain is a F23 with an adapted long driveshaft.
It is a drivetrain that is well desired from people who likes GM.
The clutch is a common one: FF 1200lbs, with a rigid disk of 6 pads.
There is not much in suspension... it is a Fênix suspension for all terrain use.
The wheels are originals from Vectra GTX 2011.
And the brakes are 288mm with "Red" pads. The system is from PowerBrakes.
It is funny when I drive my Vectra in transit...
...well, that's a car that doesn't draw attention, its color is not showy...

...there is no badges, no emblems, nothing. It's only 
 a Vectra, and a very old model.

So when I drive in the streets... 
...people don't pay attention because it is turbo.
Everything begins when people realize there is an intercooler...
...it scares, so the diversion begins.
But the most funny thing is when I accelerate and change gears on flathshift (Megasquirt).
There is an explosion sound because...
...the turbo pressure is mantained.
The exhaust explosion is very loud.
People are so shocked that they say: "CA-R*-LHO!"
This is emotion from seeing an old Vectra...
...with backfires like as if it was a Lamborghini.
This is the funniest thing about driving this Vectra in traffic.

In the future you will not see big 
 changes from what it have right now.

This car setup for daily use, which is 
 what I use it for, is perfect.
In the future I pretend to rework the Engine Cylinder Head...
...change wheels, to OZ Futura, which is my dream.
Maybe better brakes, but more of aesthetics.
I already bought a grill without emblem,
black mask headlamps...
And the car remains the way it is, which is my purpose:
an urban car, daily, discreet, but with a little touch of emotion inside.
I never wanted the fastest car, I never wanted a legendary car, I always wanted a car...
...that made me feel good, and I think this Vectra fulfill this issue for me.

title: GM VECTRA CD TURBO / FLAT SHIFT MEGASQUIRT
